nodal_department: Department Of Woman Empowerment & Child Development
brief_description: "Anganwadi Workers Welfare Fund" is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that provides financial assistance to the anganwadi worker/helper of the state.
detailed_description: "Anganwadi Workers Welfare Fund" is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand. The scheme aims to provides financial assistance to the anganwadi workers/helpers of the state on attaining the age of 60 years.
benefits: Minimum amount of ₹30,000 /- will be given. After completing 20 years of service ₹1,30,000/- will be given.
Note : There is a provision for an increase of 5 % per year the deposit amount.
eligibility_criteria: Beneficiary should be a permanent resident of Uttarakhand. Beneficiary should be an Anganwadi Worker/Helper. The age of the beneficiary should be 60 years or more.

steps: Applicant need to download the application form.  Applications are submitted to the CDPO office. Required documents include:
Certificate of retirement from the Anganwadi center Aadhar card Bank account details

documents_required: Proof of retirement. Aadhar card. Bank account details. Any other document (as requested).
